summary: Comprehensive testing of EKA-AI Go4Garage Intelligence Platform completed successfully. Backend APIs tested with 95.2% success rate, frontend UI/UX tested with 100% success rate. All core features working including auth, AI chat, product dashboards, and navigation.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for successful creation

passed_tests: Protected route access and JWT authentication
Home dashboard with all 4 product cards (URGAA, GSTSAAS, IGNITION, ARJUN)
Ask AI chat interface with pipeline status and provenance
AI chat integration with LLM (KAILASH) returning proper responses
URGAA EV charging dashboard with stations and metrics
GSTSAAS job card creation and listing
ARJUN training courses and progress tracking
IGNITION customer intelligence and churn risk analysis
Finance dashboard with transactions and metrics
Premium glassmorphism design with proper contrast
All interactive elements with data-testid attributes
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update GSTSAAS job card creation endpoint to return 201 status code instead of 200 for successful creation (currently returns 200 but works correctly)
